text: First time here for consultant with Dr Felix,Dr Felix was very friendly and patient, Dr Felix knew my last time encounter, so he very honest and only advises what i  need to do,I appreciate most about Dr Li is that he would advise according to the patients' needs, and not hard selling. I came in feeling nervous and anxious for the consultation, but Dr. Felix Li and his team did a fantastic job of reassuring me and making me feel comfortable that everything would be okay. The results turned out great, and I noticed improvement after the session.

I visited Dr Felix clinic and had an outstanding experience.

Dr. Jessica was friendly, approachable and knowledgeable. She made sure I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way. The staff were also very experienced, attentive and made me feel at ease throughout my visit.

I appreciated the clinic‚Äôs modern interior, cleanliness and the seamless appointment scheduling process. Overall, I felt very well cared for and would highly recommend to anyone in need of quality aesthetics services.

Dr Felix has a keen eye for aesthetics. He took ages off my face with his steady hands and good injection techniques. The clinic is bright and cozy, and his assistant Mint and Rachel always assuring during the procedures. The sessions were always well planned out and did not feel rushed through like some of the other clinics I‚Äôve visited.

Dr Jessica is a super friendly, professional awesome doctor, very assuring and very detailed to my needs. Even though I had a scare the second day she made time for me nonetheless. Her team of nurses are very friendly as well so looking forward to future treatments. Dr Felix Li though busy, made time to explain treatments on details. Overall recommend to anyone who wants to try their first treatment.
